response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a price that is significantly below its market value. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
